post.body: Brrrrr Yes! It's been a cold & going into wednesday they say. Had some sun today. Worried about 4 hummingbirds still here!
btween Tacoma & Seattle, w/lots of Puget Sound (saltwater) shoreline. Spokane is Eastern Washington, other side of Cascades
who helps you with all this? just curious.
how's the blog platform changeover going? RU working wth the tomato?
yep
Busy day for you! How was Boot Camp? Better Stretch!
Steve, the stats for Nov in my area between Seattle and Tacoma have deteriorated considerably over Oct - 52% drop in SFR units sold
Hey you - is this tweet the last it snowed before this past weekend?
I am so glad you posted this info - I've wondered how people here do that with bud and tiny urls - thanks Brad!
how many hours total? This is longer than "talking turkey"
By the way, Heather - it Does Snow in Seattle and It's 20 degrees, brrr, and windy - Your kind of weather here - hope it warms up!
hmm - would think less time?
The Dr Doom analysis is proving out - like that post
Wouldn't we all! I believe this is going to be long, complicated and take lots of out of the box thinking and media cooperation
Sales of this could save the economy!
On Christmas Eve, only Realtors (c), or roofers would be thinking about eaves. sorry - couldn't resist ;-)
oh stop! Cari has a point! But wait, it's like that place called Point No Point here in Washington somewhere.
Buy bags and tissue - there must be a 'green' way to conquer the problem!
Can you please have a cooking class for us? What's for Christmas dinner?
oh, can you say who - others here might want to know
O-o-o-o this looks tres' magnifique and I only wonder about the lemons, though - just garnish?
if you mean facebook, I just tried logging in and it says it's down for maintenance
great hummingbird photos by Stealth Porter
Finished blog post on Federal Way stats at http://www.dikawellblogsrealestate.com Bad news sellers, Good news buyers
Mozart to keep me calm as I gasp over Trendgraphix reports on Federal Way Facts & Trends - huge month over month changes - not good.
Finally loading that software for the aircard - and enjoying Celtic Christmas music.
Snowing in NE Tacoma! Yeah!
Staying in, nursing a cold, adding aircard software to laptop, reading Buddha book and Realtor Mag - and adding photos to flickr w/cat Rocky
The offer we've been told was heading our way seems to be stalled somewhere between West Seattle and Graham - feels like a weather report!
And also, what exactly does it really mean when someone says "it's not good to tempt fate?" Does anyone know?
Thinking oh, nuts, I forgot to get fruitcake! That's not acceptable .. that I forgot, I mean - argh!
Baking & doing some work @ home- I might have an offer coming in, but, oh, I can't stand the silence in between 'possible' & "you have mail"
We officially have 7.5 inches of snow on our picnic table. And now it's crunchy and good packing.
Just posted King County Bulletin on Winter Weather Safety Tips at http://budurl.com/lpgq #seatst
Lying down for a long winter's nap.
Could have up to 8 inches of snow in Federal Way WA by tomorrow evening! That's exciting with not much removal equipment! #seatst
Fussing with my blog again - I'm still learning how to do stuff to class it up, make it user friendly, informative and worth reading.
Looking at sweet baby photos from clients who had newborns this year - wow, another baby boom it seems! Cold nites - lots of u know what ;-)
In Federal Way, watch out at Peasley Cyn and Military - ice! #seatst
Winter storm warning: Significant winter storm/hazardous winter weather is occurring, imminent, or likely, threat 2 life & prop #seatst
